## Runtime.IResourceResolverOptions.suppressNullAsDelete property

Controls whether null values in resource composition should suppress properties instead of setting them to null. When true, properties with null values from higher-priority partial candidates will be omitted from the final composed resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
suppressNullAsDelete?: boolean;
```
